about_the_game:
Honeymancer is a cute RPG Farm Simulator with wave-based combat where you play as a Bear Witch who uses Honeymagic to protect the forest from evil robots and help her fellow neighbors.

BEEKEEPING & GARDENING

As a honeymancer you need honey to cast spells. Help your bee buddies make honey by planting flowers that they can collect nectar from. The more flowers you have the more honey they make.
There is a wide variety of flowers that you can choose from, pick the ones you like and create your own blooming garden!

SAVE THE FOREST

Evil robots have invaded the forest you live in and it is up to you to stop them. Use your honeymagic to prevent them from destroying trees throughout the forest. The robots come in waves and each wave is tougher than the last, you can only fight as long as you still have honey.
As a witch you will unlock and learn different spells that will help you in the fight against the robots.

BEFRIEND YOUR NEIGHBORS

You will need to leave the Bear Witch's comfort zone and befriend the other animals in the forest. Do your best by helping and supporting them through personal quests and dialogues. Being kind and helpful is good for everyone, by helping you will unlock new spells, flowers, decorations, and more!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2

name: Honeymancer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 56 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Honeymancer is a cute RPG Farm Simulator with wave-based combat. Play as a secluded Bear Witch, who has to protect the forest from evil robots with her honey magic. Help her bee buddies make honey by planting flowers and befriend her animal neighbors.
